com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurEthConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurEthConfig

  • public class NurEthConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Sampo Ethernet device configuration parameters.
    See Also:
    NurApi.getEthConfig(), NurApi.setEthConfig(NurEthConfig)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ADDRESS_TYPE_DHCP
      NUR module will get IP address via DHCP.
      static int ADDRESS_TYPE_STATIC
      NUR module will use static IP address.
      int addrType
      (Get/Set) Address type 0 = DHCP(default) and 1 = static mode.
      java.lang.String gw
      (Get/Set) Gateway (used in static IP mode).
      static int HOST_MODE_CLIENT
      Host mode Client.
      static int HOST_MODE_SERVER
      Host mode Server.
      java.lang.String hostip
      (Get/Set) Client host IP (if host mode = Client).
      int hostMode
      (Get/Set) Host mode 0 = Server (default) and 1 = Client.
      int hostPort
      (Get/Set) Client host port (if host mode = Client)
      java.lang.String ip
      (Get) Current IP address of Sampo device.
      java.lang.String mac
      (Get/(Set only if using transport as broadcast)) MAC address of device.
      java.lang.String mask
      (Get/Set) Subnet mask (used in static IP mode).
      byte[] reserved
      (Get/Set) reserved for future usage.
      int serverPort
      (Get/Set) Server port where client connects to when host mode = Server.
      java.lang.String staticip
      (Get/Set) Static IP.
      java.lang.String title
      (Get/Set) Title of Sampo device.
      int transport
      Transport method 0 = NUR and 1 = BROADCAST.
      static int TRANSPORT_BROADCAST
      Transport is Broadcast and filtering is set to MAC address.
      static int TRANSPORT_NUR
      Transport will be via currently connected NUR device.
      int version
      (Get) Current Revision of ethernet CPU firmware.

      • transport

        public int transport
        Transport method 0 = NUR and 1 = BROADCAST. Notice that valid MAC address of target Sampo must be set on broadcast. (TRANSPORT_NUR, TRANSPORT_BROADCAST) Response indicates type of trasnpot: 1=phy 2=wlan

      • title

        public java.lang.String title
        (Get/Set) Title of Sampo device. Default title: "Nordic ID Sampo S1".

      • version

        public int version
        (Get) Current Revision of ethernet CPU firmware.

      • ip

        public java.lang.String ip
        (Get) Current IP address of Sampo device.

      • mask

        public java.lang.String mask
        (Get/Set) Subnet mask (used in static IP mode).

      • gw

        public java.lang.String gw
        (Get/Set) Gateway (used in static IP mode).

      • addrType

        public int addrType
        (Get/Set) Address type 0 = DHCP(default) and 1 = static mode. (ADDRESS_TYPE_DHCP, ADDRESS_TYPE_STATIC)

      • staticip

        public java.lang.String staticip
        (Get/Set) Static IP.

      • mac

        public java.lang.String mac
        (Get/(Set only if using transport as broadcast)) MAC address of device.

      • serverPort

        public int serverPort
        (Get/Set) Server port where client connects to when host mode = Server.

      • hostMode

        public int hostMode
        (Get/Set) Host mode 0 = Server (default) and 1 = Client. (HOST_MODE_SERVER, HOST_MODE_CLIENT)

      • hostip

        public java.lang.String hostip

    • Constructor Detail

      • NurEthConfig

        public NurEthConfig()
        Used to create an empty NUR module Ethernet configure.

      • NurEthConfig

        public NurEthConfig(int transport,
                    java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String mask,
                    java.lang.String gw,
                    int addrType,
                    java.lang.String staticip,
                    java.lang.String mac,
                    int serverPort,
                    int hostmode,
                    java.lang.String hostip,
                    int hostPort)
        Used to create a NUR module Ethernet configure.
        Parameters:
        transport - Transport method 0 = NUR and 1 = BROADCAST. Notice that valid target MAC address must be set on broadcast. (TRANSPORT_NUR, TRANSPORT_BROADCAST)
        title - Title of Sampo device. Default title: "Nordic ID Sampo S1".
        mask - Subnet mask (used in static IP mode).
        gw - Gateway (used in static IP mode).
        addrType - Address type 0 = DHCP(default) and 1 = STATIC.
        staticip - Static IP.
        mac - MAC address of target device. Set only if using transport as broadcast.
        serverPort - Server port where client connects to when hostmode = Server.
        hostmode - Host mode, 0 = Server (default) and 1 = Client.
        hostip - Client host IP (if Mode = Client)
        hostPort - Client host port (if Mode = Client)
